ingredients: 2 cups white sugar, 2 cups cantaloupe - peeled, seeded and pureed, 1 cup vegetable oil, 3 large eggs, 1 tablespoon vanilla extract, 3 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1 teaspoon salt,   +   3/4 teaspoon baking powder,   +   1/2 teaspoon ground ginger
nutrition: Total Fat 18g 24%, Saturated Fat 5g 26%, Cholesterol 40mg 13%, Sodium 242mg 11%, Total Carbohydrate 48g 18%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 33g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 6mg 29%, Calcium 32mg 2%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 103mg 2%
